data.name: Financial applications suite
data.desc: Web-based application suite to support invoicing, billing, and reporting enterprise-level processes.
benefitsFromProject: Centralized platform for financial management
Real-time data access and reporting
Audit-trail by design
Integration with other including 3rd party business systems for seamless data flow

data.name: Real-time decision-helper platform
data.desc: Web-based platform to provide real-time decision support for various business processes.
benefitsFromProject: Automated decision-making based on predefined rules
User-friendly interface for easy rule creation and management
Integration with other business systems so present recommendations to users
Real-time data evaluation and returning instructions under 100ms

data.name: Timekeeping
data.desc: Web-based application for a store's employee management, including recruitment, time-keeping, reporting, and payroll.
benefitsFromProject: One entry point for a store manager to handle all employee-related tasks
Improved accuracy in time-keeping and payroll
Integration with BI tools for advanced reporting
Enhanced recruitment process with applicant tracking

data.name: Merchandaising platform
data.desc: Web-based mobile friendly application for managing store's merchandise.
benefitsFromProject: Centralized platform for managing merchandise across multiple stores
Real-time inventory management and reporting
Integration with other business systems for seamless data flow
Enhanced decision-making with advanced analytics

data.name: Retail Application Platform
data.desc: Aplicaton platform with flexible architecture to support multiple retail applications.
benefitsFromProject: Modular architecture allowing for easy addition of new applications
Shared services and components to reduce development time
Scalable design to handle increasing user load
Consistent user experience across different applications

data.name: Airline's Representative Portal
data.desc: Mobile friendly web-based application to capture and report ground handling operations.
benefitsFromProject: Streamlined reporting process for ground handling operations
Improved data accuracy and timeliness
Mobile accessibility for representatives in the field
Enhanced communication between ground staff and airline management
